vain.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who is vain is too proud of their good looks, abilities, or position – used to show disapproval
vain.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Men can be just as vain as women.
vain.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a vain attempt, hope, or search fails to achieve the result you wanted
vain.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The young mother died in a vain attempt to save her drowning son.
vain.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: – Meaning 3: a vain attempt, hope, or search fails to achieve the result you wanted
vain.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: People close their windows at night in a vain attempt to shut out the sound of gunfire.
Young men moved south in the vain hope of finding work.
Mothers have been to every shop in town in a vain search for the toy.
